pages.title: Bookwyrm Charm
pages.description: Bookwyrm Charms can be used on a Storage Lectern to increase the number of accessible inventories. Augment a Ritual of Awakening with Book and Quills in order to obtain charms. Bookwyrms can be dyed using white, black, blue, green, red, or purple dye.
In the event that they die or are dispelled, they will drop their charm.
